description: While the El Search Party wait for the blacksmiths to repair the path to the Fire Temple, they decided to rest at the Phantasmal Geyser to recover. After a short bath, Elsword has a brief conversation with Ignia, where they both express their desire to defeat the demons for the sake of the people they cherish. After Ignia leads half of the group to the Fire Temple, she betrays them and organizes an ambush against the El Search Party.
